pages.text: A container holding the essence of a captured creature. Created by the $(l:animus:sigils/sigil_chains)Sigil of the Phantom Chain$(), this item preserves an entity's complete state.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Release:$() Right-click on a block to spawn the captured entity$(br2)$(bold)Preserved Data:$()$(li)Entity type and health$(li)Equipment and inventory$(li)Custom names$(li)AI state and attributes$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() The Mob Soul is consumed when the entity is released.$(br2)$(italic)Souls bound to your will.$()
